name: ZOMBIE SWARMS
description:
ZOMBIE SWARMS

This is a 2D top-down shooter game.

The game takes place in an abandoned facility, the main character is a soldier who was sent by the military to restore missing memory cards that contains data that could help in the development of a cure to the zombie virus, move through levels and try to find the cards.

Key-Map: You can find it in the pause menu by pressing 'ESC' during game play.

CREDITS:

3rd Party assets:

  • Monogram font from datagoblin
  • Art from rileygombart
  • Sci-fi interior tiles from Buch
  • https://freesound.org

Have a nice day ^_^
